entry.dcterms:description: 1. Public judgement of the current political situation 2. Public opinions about the role of hunting and shooting 3. Confidence in the institutions of democracy, in the media, the churches

A 1000-person decreasing, random probability sample, nationally representative of the Hungarian adult population.
face-to-face interview and self-administered questionnaire
1. block (3-17. quest.): A, 2. block (19-35. quest.): B, 3. block (17. quest.): A, 4. block (40. quest. + self quest.): D
